name: a-MAZE-ing (Thanos Makris)
description:
A-MAZE-ing is a procedurally generated maze game made with Unity.

Controls
Arrows: move 
Mouse: click on UI elements 
Escape: exit

Features

  • Arcade - Increasing difficulty after each successful escape from the maze (maze becomes bigger)
  • Generate your own maze - Click on the gear and set your custom maze dimensions
  • Day/Night mode - Play with either lights on or off by toggling daylight on/off

Simply download, extract and play!
